[Desc]               <blue>Charles is a 30-year old, brawny, six-foot two muscle American builder with biceps the size of baseballs.  He has charcoal black hair and squinting eyes that always seem to be looking at others with contempt.  He is shirtless, wearing only a pair of gym shorts and tennis shoes.  He's already threatened to beat you to an inch of your life if he loses--which, of course, he proudly announces cannot and will not happen to a runt like you.  You can't wait to take this asshole down a peg.</blue>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>There's nothing left of Charles Killjoy, the brawny muscle builder.  Instead, a giggling, horny blonde girl with pink highlights occupies his old body, wearing a sexy skin-tight miniskirt and a miniscule t-shirt proudly proclaiming her sluttiness and desire to fuck anyone and everyone.  Knowing that she lost the game, she pouts a little bit, but you aren't even sure she remembers how the game began.  But when you point out how beautiful of a creature she is, she skips over and plants a kiss on your lips, smelling of roses.  Singing to herself, she struts out of the studio to her new life as Chichi Hotschick!</pink>;
